scripts.install:all: npm run install:public && npm run install:functions && npm run install:scripts
scripts.update: npm run update:public && npm run update:functions && npm run update:scripts
scripts.clean: rm -rf .firebase *.log ios-libraries/lib && npm run clean:public && npm run clean:functions
scripts.build: npm run build:public && npm run build:functions
scripts.predeploy: npm run clean && npm run install:all && npm run update && npm run build
scripts.deploy: npm run predeploy && firebase deploy -P default && npm run postdeploy
scripts.deploy:dev: npm run predeploy && firebase deploy -P dev && npm run postdeploy
scripts.deploy:all: npm run predeploy && firebase deploy -P dev && firebase deploy -P default && npm run postdeploy
scripts.deploy-only-hosting: npm run predeploy && firebase deploy -P default --only hosting && npm run postdeploy
scripts.deploy-only-hosting:dev: npm run predeploy && firebase deploy -P dev --only hosting && npm run postdeploy
scripts.deploy-only-hosting:all: npm run predeploy && firebase deploy -P dev --only hosting && firebase deploy -P default --only hosting && npm run postdeploy
scripts.deploy-except-hosting: npm run predeploy && firebase deploy -P default --except hosting && npm run postdeploy
scripts.deploy-except-hosting:dev: npm run predeploy && firebase deploy -P dev --except hosting && npm run postdeploy
scripts.deploy-except-hosting:all: npm run predeploy && firebase deploy -P dev --except hosting && firebase deploy -P default --except hosting && npm run postdeploy
